journeys.name: Daily Wage Calculator Access
journeys.findings: Successfully accessed Daily Wage Calculation section via Settings > Payroll navigation path. Table displaying three services (Salary proration, EOS leave encashment, Unpaid leave deduction) confirmed.

journeys.name: Daily Wage Calculator Configuration
journeys.findings: Successfully opened Salary Proration configuration modal showing three calculation type options: Working days, Calendar days, and Custom days. Dropdown interaction confirmed.

journeys.name: End of Service Eligibility Configuration
journeys.findings: Successfully navigated to End of Service eligibility section and opened configuration modal. Modal displays paid leave types with daily rate calculation methods. Two leave types shown with configured settings: Vacation45 (Custom days - 22) and Test Leen 11 (Calendar days).

journeys.name: End of Service Calculation Setup
journeys.findings: Successfully opened EOS leave encashment configuration modal. Display shows eligible paid leave types table with daily wage calculations. Configuration shows: Basic salary / 60 days with 'Overwrite calculation in policies' toggle enabled. Warning indicates change will affect 33 eligible paid leave policies.

journeys.name: Unpaid Leave Policy Configuration
journeys.findings: Successfully opened Unpaid Leave Deduction configuration modal. Display shows eligible unpaid leave types with daily wage calculations. Configuration shows: Basic salary + allowances / 30 days with 'Overwrite calculation in policies' toggle enabled. Warning indicates change will affect new requests in 14 unpaid leave policies.

journeys.name: Salary Proration Configuration
journeys.findings: Successfully opened Salary Proration configuration modal. Display shows description: 'Salary proration affects employees' first salary and end of service settlement'. Configuration shows: Custom days set to 30.45. Formula displayed: Daily wage = (Basic salary + allowances) / 30.45 days.
